title: About
p1: This website collects data from the Comunidad de Madrid
p2: and presents it in an easy to understand form.
p3: All of the data comes from the authorities in Madrid - and is available at the Health Ward level. The data is updated every Tuesday.
p4: The site was created in part as a service to the people of Madrid, but also as a learning project - to help me continue to grow and learn as a budding web developer.
frontend: The GutHub repository for the React.js frontend can be found
backend: The repo for the Java SpringBoot backend can be found
contact: If you have any questions or queeries, please don't hesitate to contact me via the contact form which can be found
